ISSUE.TITLE: When build is cached, returns `undefined` for node version

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: document `secrets` and `certs` commands (#168) * document `secrets` command in --help * document `certs` command in --help

COMMIT.MESSAGE: remove: delete deployment by URL (#172) So this now works: ``` now rm https://ffitest-hcznbannyc.now.sh ``` Fixes #87.
Add support for `fullPath` property for files (#87)

[now-node][now-next] Bump node-file-trace to 0.4.1 (#3481) Bumps `node-file-trace` to version [0.4.1](https://github.com/zeit/node-file-trace/releases/tag/0.4.1). - Add special case for semver@7: [#87](https://github.com/zeit/node-file-trace/pull/87) - Handle babel/ts compiled imports: [#79](https://github.com/zeit/node-file-trace/pull/79)
